parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The time after which streams can be ingested. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

If you do not specify this parameter, stream ingest is permanently disabled.

parameters.name: RoomId
parameters.description:
The ID of the room.

The ID can be up to 16 characters in length.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description:
The custom data. You can send the data to users when you disable stream ingest.

The value of this parameter can be up to 4,096 characters in length.
